channel.title: CVE Feed for BdThemes -- Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BdThemes -- Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons

item.title: CVE-2024-47629|2024-10-07T13:19:32.439Z -- bdthemes -- ultimate%20store%20kit%20elementor%20addons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BdThemes Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons: from n/a through 2.0.5.
